        return []
    else:
        return [tri(n - 1) + tri(n - 2)] + tri(n) + [tri(n - 1)]

    tri(2) = 1 + (2 / 2) = 2
    tri(4) = 3

    first n + 1 numbers of the Tribonacci sequence.
    Examples:
    tri(3) = [1, 3, 2, 8]

    y = 3
    x = 1
    while x!= 0:

            x = x / 3

    x = x + y
    # Return the first n + 1 numbers of the Tribonacci sequence
    return [x for x in range(1, n + 1)]

        tri.append(n)
        tri.append(tri(n - 1))
        tri.append(tri(n - 2))
        tri.append(tri(n + 1))
        return tri
